description:
****** BUMPER EDITION INCLUDING 120 STICKERS! *******

☆ THE sticker app for children! Join thousands of users already enjoying Make a Scene. Over 1 million scenes created!

☆ WHY PARENTS AND TEACHERS LOVE THIS APP

Make a Scene Princess Fairy Tales is a fun interactive game that engages children’s natural sense of creativity. Helping to develop vocabulary, fine motor skills, co-ordination and creative thinking, Make a Scene offers a great way for your child to play and learn at the same time.

☆ WHY CHILDREN LOVE IT TOO!

The game features 5 popular princess fairy tales: Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, Cinderella, Beauty and the Beast and Rapunzel.  There is also an option to load all characters so you can make your own fairy tale! As well as the main fairy tale characters, it also includes princes, horses, woodland animals, castles, tea party items and other enchanted props to bring the scene to life.

By dragging and dropping these digital, animated ‘stickers’ onto the different backgrounds available, your child can create a large number of unique scenes. A clear voice-over reads the name of each item aloud, and is accompanied by fun animations and sound effects where possible. Make a Scene recreates the popular ‘fuzzy felts’ and sticker books in an interactive digital product.

☆ KEY FEATURES

120 different ‘stickers’ featuring characters from 5 popular princess fairy tales
Mix and match 7 different backgrounds and 6 different foregrounds
Multi touch support
Double-tap to flip
Save scene as an image to your device
Automatic depth of field
Descriptive audio
Engaging animations
Sound effects 
Background audio to bring the experience to life
Ability to move and re-arrange ‘stickers’
Ability to remove individual ‘stickers’ or reset all ‘stickers’ and position them once again

☆ OTHER APPS IN THIS SERIES

★ SAFARI
★ OUTER SPACE
★ UNDER THE SEA
★ JUNGLE
★ CHRISTMAS
★ POLAR ADVENTURE
★ FARMYARD
